sentences.sContent: As I relayed the yoga teacher incident, my voice echoed across the canyon between who I was and what I was saying.
sentences.sContent_eng: As I relayed the yoga teacher incident, my voice echoed across the canyon between who I was and what I was saying.
sentences.sCn: 我跟她说了瑜伽老师的事情之后，我感觉的声音像环绕在峡谷里，在我是谁和我在说什么之间回荡着。

sentences.sContent: In the desert, a canyon that snakes through the landscape could also prevent crossing without creating an eyesore.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the desert, a canyon that snakes through the landscape could also prevent crossing without creating an eyesore.
sentences.sCn: 在沙漠中，一个蜿蜒地穿过景观的峡谷也可以让视线穿过而没有任何障碍。

sentences.sContent: Made of plywood Okoume, this lightweight pieces are constructed by a series of layers rings pile up together, simulating the shape of a canyon or mountain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Made of plywood Okoume, this lightweight pieces are constructed by a series of layers rings pile up together, simulating the shape of a canyon or mountain.
sentences.sCn: 这套轻质家具由奥古曼产的胶合板制作而成。他们是由一层层的圆环累积而成，模拟出峡谷或山的形状。

trans.tranOther: a deep valley with very steep sides of rock that usually has a river running through it
